::Neody::

As Flare lands and opens his cockpit, Neody tumbles out, collapsing 
on the ground. With an unpleasant sound, he regurgitates some gooey 
liquid onto the ground. He was now glad that he hadn't followed 
Biomass's order and had left without eating.

"Sorry," he says, standing up, "Not used to flying."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Cygnar::
>     "I agree entirely.  I wouldn't want to lead anyone day to day.  
I was 
> training to be his tactician just before Magmatron left.  You 
command the 
> group but let me plan the battles.  You tell me when and where and 
I'll get 
> it done.  Sound fair."
